Jessica Mulroney has "stepped away" from her role at The Shoebox Project, a charity she co-founded that distributes gift-filled shoeboxes to women impacted by homelessness across Canada.

articles.author: Giles Sheldrick and Mark Reynolds
articles.title: Dame Vera Lynn: Heroine who put others first right to end of her life - Express
articles.description: DESPITE her failing health selfless Dame Vera Lynn displayed the heartache and worry of someone who always put others first during her final interview - with the Daily Express.

articles.author: Hayley Anderson
articles.title: Ross Kemp: What will Ross Kemp's next ITV documentary be about? When is the release date? - Express
articles.description: ROSS KEMP returned to ITV tonight for a documentary on Dementia. But what will the former EastEnders star investigate in next week's show?
